message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will be invaluable to your operations. I understand its worth to you is significant, and I'm willing to negotiate a fair price. My minimum asking price is $1,200,000, but I'm open to discussing a mutually beneficial arrangement. This product is truly one-of-a-kind, and I believe this is a chance you won't want to miss. Let me know your thoughts.
